page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: The children and teachers of four schools have been involved in compiling the information contained in the block. They are{Milton Park First and{Milton Park Middle schools, {St.Jude's First and Middle}and{Somers {Town Middle School,}all in Southsea. The research and text pages were produced by the children under the guidance of Pat Sharp, Linda Tier, Brian Young,Chris Grieve,Derek Boulter,and John Hulett, and were co-ordinated by{Sylvia Harvey}of Milton Park Middle School.Our thanks for the hard work and enthusiasm shown by the children from these and other teacher's classes who contributed to the project.
